Package nl.codevs.strinput.system

Annotation Interface Param

@Retention(RUNTIME) @Target(PARAMETER) public @interface Param
Command parameters' annotation.
Since:
v0.1

  • Optional Element Summary

    Optional Elements
    Modifier and Type
    Optional Element
    Description
    String[]
    aliases
    The aliases of this parameter.
    boolean
    contextual
    Attempts to dynamically pull context from the user, default data or uses one of the custom supported types.
    Requires a context handler in nl.codevs.strinput.system.context
    String
    defaultValue
    The default value for this argument.
    The entered string is parsed to the parameter type similarly to how normal command input would be.
    Which indicates the variable MUST be defined by the person running the command if this is undefined.
    If you define this, the variable automatically becomes non-required, but can still be set.
    String
    description
    The description of this parameter, used in help-popups in game.
    The default value is DEFAULT_DESCRIPTION
    String
    name
    The main name of this command.
    Required parameter.
    This is what is used in game, alongside any (if specified) aliases

  • Element Details

    • name

      String name
      The main name of this command.
      Required parameter.
      This is what is used in game, alongside any (if specified) aliases
      Returns:
      the name of this parameter
      Default:
      ""

    • description

      String description
      The description of this parameter, used in help-popups in game.
      The default value is DEFAULT_DESCRIPTION
      Returns:
      the description of this parameter
      Default:
      "No Description Provided"

    • defaultValue

      String defaultValue
      The default value for this argument.
      The entered string is parsed to the parameter type similarly to how normal command input would be.
      Which indicates the variable MUST be defined by the person running the command if this is undefined.
      If you define this, the variable automatically becomes non-required, but can still be set.
      Returns:
      the default value (as a string) of this parameter
      Default:
      ""

    • aliases

      String[] aliases
      The aliases of this parameter.

      Provides additional values to just the name if specified, or the method name by default
      Can be initialized as just a string (ex. "alias") or as an array (ex. {"alias1", "alias2"})
      If someone uses /plugin foo bar=baz, and you specify alias="b" here, /plugin foo b=baz will do the exact same.

      Returns:
      the aliases of this parameter
      Default:
      {""}

    • contextual

      boolean contextual
      Attempts to dynamically pull context from the user, default data or uses one of the custom supported types.
      Requires a context handler in nl.codevs.strinput.system.context
      Returns:
      true if this parameter may be derived from context.
      Default:
      false
